articles.title: France says coronavirus death toll rises to 27,625 - Reuters
articles.description: French health authorities reported 96 new coronavirus deaths on Saturday, as the country eases from a two month lockdown.
articles.content:
PARIS (Reuters) - French health authorities reported 96 new coronavirus deaths on Saturday, as the country eases from a two month lockdown.

articles.title: Startling study shows how easy it is to spread coronavirus at restaurants - Express
articles.description: CORONAVIRUS continues to affect our lives and, for many Britons, fantasies of enjoying a delicious meal in a restaurant have been sadly shattered. A new experiment shows just how easily the virus is spread through utensils, phones and faces.

articles.title: Canadian military reverses course – now says five personnel have tested positive for COVID-19 - The Guardian
articles.description:
The Canadian Forces has reversed course on releasing information on the novel coronavirus and is now acknowledging that five of its personnel have tested positive for COVID-19.


 The individuals were involved in helping in long-term care
